author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49303

#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_15_1_X`:
   * This is the PR for the 15_1_X branch (this is the release cycle currently used for Run-3 HLT-menu development).
      
These updates correspond to the **"V1.0" HIon menu for the 2025 PbPb** data-taking period.
This update includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets:

- [CMSHLT-3147](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3147) [TRK,HIN] Remove DQM plugins from `DQM_PixelReconstruction_v` and `DQM_HIPixelReconstruction_v`
- [CMSHLT-3643](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3643) [DAQ,TSG] Update HLT to run with secondary TCDS
- [CMSHLT-3654](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3654) [TRK,HIN] HLT-Tracking updates for 2025 HI menu: switching on the good edge algo for pixel local reco
- [CMSHLT-3658](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3658) [HIN] HLT menu HIon for 2025 PbPb run
- [CMSHLT-3659](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3659) [TRK,HIN] `RawSecond` in HIon menu
- [CMSHLT-3666](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3666) [TRK,HIN] Clean-up instances of `PixelTrackProducerFromSoAAlpaka* and SiPixelRecHitFromSoAAlpaka*` in the HLT combined tables

In addition this PR introduces the following commits:
- 2fc854537b184437cdd6d5657d9aa8bbd7723b14: Move some more scripts to 15_1
- 4d7fe58e192b229e4f25bb3ff12d72ede5c55b7f: Integration of configuration changes from #49149 and disabling of HLT customization function
- 2abb76bbdd2173fd603d4dfe350e3d7e0947f931: update `hltPathOwners.json` for HLT menu HIon 2025 V1.0
- 401512e5ed297cd57a1f339ef230ce9f2209785c: bumped version of Paths for HLT HIon-2025 V1.0 (base: `/dev/CMSSW_15_0_0/HLT/V129`)
- ab529c7be2d44d91c8b947c05c0e3357c4b28baf: upgrade `phase1_2025_realistic_hi` `autoCond` and `run3_mc_HIon` key to use a 151X based Global Tag

---
**N.B.**
The change in the last commit is needed because this GT is made by rebasing the HI GT queue of 151X  [link](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/queue_list/Prod/151X_mcRun3_2025_realistic_HI_Queue) from Light-Ion run to HI of 2024. The relevant tags picked from the [diff](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/141X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_HI_v14/151X_mcRun3_2025_realistic_HI_v1).

#### PR validation:

TSG Integration tests.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49303 to the 2025 PbPb production cycle (`CMSSW_15_1_X`)
title: HLT menu development for `15_1_X` (2/N)
